name: Training and Development Summit Northamptonshire May 2019
content: The Training and Development Summit is a unique event for senior learning and development professionals, and the suppliers who service them. It is focused around connecting buyers with suppliers covering all areas of learning and development – from Change Management to Training; Coaching and Mentoring to Team Building; Management Training to Motivation and Incentives; and beyond. Benefits include: • Free for senior learning and development professionals to attend. • Learning and development executives are matched with suppliers for a series of face-to-face, pre-arranged meetings based on mutual requirements. • Insightful and inspirational seminars hosted throughout the two days. • Opportunity to network with like-minded peers. • All hospitality – including overnight accommodation, all meals and refreshments, plus an invitation to the gala dinner with entertainment – is entirely complimentary for learning and development professionals. • £millions of new business has been generated via these 'meet the buyer' events URLs: Booking: https://go.evvnt.com/253729-0?pid=4868 Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/253729-1?pid=4868 Twitter: https://go.evvnt.com/253729-3?pid=4868 LinkedIn: https://go.evvnt.com/253729-5?pid=4868 Time: 8:00 am to 4:00 pm. Venue details: Whittlebury Hall Hotel, Hotel and Spa Whittlebury, Northamptonshire, NN12 8QH, United Kingdom. Price: Upon request: GBP 0.0.
